by_theme.map: function(doc, meta){ for(var i = 0; i < doc.themes.length; i++){ emit(doc.themes[i].name, null); } }

by_theme_and_rating.map: function(doc, meta){ for(var i = 0; i < doc.themes.length; i++){ emit([doc.themes[i].name, doc.themes[i].userRating], null); } }

by_country.map: function(doc, meta){if(doc.lyrics && doc.artist && doc.title){emit(doc.artist.country, {title: doc.title, lyrics: doc.lyrics.lyricText});}}

by_artist_album_count.map: function(doc, meta){ if(doc.artist.name && doc.album.releaseDate && doc.album.name) emit(doc.artist.name,[doc.album.name, doc.album.releaseDate]); }

by_album_song_count.map: function(doc, meta){ if(doc.album.releaseDate && doc.album.name) emit([doc.artist.name, doc.album.releaseDate], null); }
